name: mistranscribe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a mistake when writing down something that has been said or sung, or when changing something into a different written form: The reporter later said that she had mistranscribed the comments, and that the governor had not used the words attributed to him. His name was mis-transcribed as "Hodson". Related words
transcribe
mistranscription
More examplesFewer examplesThese song lyrics are amongst those most often misheard or mistranscribed. He both mistranscribes and then mistranslates the opening chapter.They mis-transcribed the numbers.He mis-transcribed data from several sources.The surname had been mis-transcribed from handwriting.
